item.title: Readings
item.description: Before the indicated lecture, read the following sections in the online text book Abstract Algebra: Theory and Applications by Tom Judson. LEC # READINGS 1 3.1, and 3.2 2 3.3 3 6.1, and 6.2 4 6.2, and 4.1 5 4.2, and 5.1 6 5.1, and 5.2 7 9.1 8 11.1, and 10.1 9 10.1, and 11.2 10 11.2 11 9.2 12 13.1 13 15.1, and 15.2 14 16.1, and 16.2 15 Review for midterm 16 16.
